LightningComponentBundle.description: A component that allows users to enter multiple email addresses.

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The label that appears above the email field

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder Text
property.description: Text that appears in the field when it's empty. Use placeholder text to give users a hint about what to enter in the field.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: If set to true, the running user must enter a value. The default value is false.

property.name: disabled
property.label: Disabled
property.description: If set to true, the user can't modify the value. The default value is false.

property.name: maxEmails
property.label: Maximum Emails
property.description: Maximum number of emails allowed (0-150). Leave blank to use default limit of 150.

property.name: allowedDomains
property.label: Allowed Domains
property.description: Comma-separated list of allowed email domains (e.g., 'example.com,*.edu'). Leave blank to allow all domains. Supports wildcards with * prefix.

property.name: blockedDomains
property.label: Blocked Domains
property.description: Comma-separated list of blocked email domains (e.g., 'spam.com,*.xyz'). Supports wildcards with * prefix.

property.name: invalidEmailErrorMessage
property.label: Invalid Email Error Message
property.description: Custom error message when an invalid email format is entered. Supports rich text.

property.name: maxEmailsErrorMessage
property.label: Maximum Emails Error Message
property.description: Custom error message when maximum emails limit is reached. Supports rich text.

property.name: duplicateEmailErrorMessage
property.label: Duplicate Email Error Message
property.description: Custom error message when attempting to add an email that already exists. Supports rich text.

property.name: allowedDomainErrorMessage
property.label: Allowed Domain Error Message
property.description: Custom error message when an email domain is not in the allowed list. Supports rich text.

property.name: blockedDomainErrorMessage
property.label: Blocked Domain Error Message
property.description: Custom error message when an email domain is in the blocked list. Supports rich text.

property.name: value
property.label: Value
property.description: Select a resource to pre-populate your collection. If you enable domain restrictions, all emails in this collection must be valid.

property.name: emailCollection
property.label: Email Collection
property.description: Output collection of the email addresses.

property.name: emailList
property.label: Email List
property.description: Output comma-delimited string of email addresses that can be used with Send Email Action for BCC and CC Recipient Address Lists.
